title: Discovery QRD-024: dimensional_fusion
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(QuantumErrorSuppression) ⊗ Ψ(StreamingInference) exhibits novel properties under dimensional_fusion transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: An innovative practical cloud-native system fusing dimensions in Φ(QuantumErrorSuppression) ⊗ Ψ(StreamingInference) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_dimensional_fusion(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(QuantumErrorSuppression) ⊗ Ψ(StreamingInference))
formulation.formal_spec: Formal: Φ(QuantumErrorSuppression) ⊗ Ψ(StreamingInference) → An innovative practical cloud-native system fusing dimensions in Φ(QuantumErrorSuppression) ⊗ Ψ(StreamingInference) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities via dimensional_fusion
